name: M-Tee's Box-Art Bomberman
overview:
The purpose of this modification is to produce a game and manual that would more accurately meet the expectations brought upon by the original NES cover art.

All graphics have been replaced with new, original graphics with the exception of the blasts, which only required a change of palette to adhere to the new aesthetic. The story has been altered from the one initially given in the manual and ending to one which is more representative of the cover art.

1.1 An alternative version compatible with “Bomberman co-op” is created now you can enjoy this experience with friends.
